solution_line_template: To walk {total_distance_needed} kilometers, Fabian would need to walk for {total_distance_needed} km / {speed_km_per_hour} km/hour = <<{total_distance_needed}/{speed_km_per_hour}={total_hours_needed}>>{total_hours_needed} hours.
As he had already walked for {hours_already_walked} hours, he would need to walk for another {total_hours_needed} hours - {hours_already_walked} hours = {additional_hours_needed} hours.
